topic.title: Home Based Primary Care Episode - conformance rules

section.p: Patient's Epsiode of care for Home Based Primary Care Program.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] admitRejectStatus with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationDate with data type Point In Time
Represents date the patient was considered/reviwed/evaluated/admitted for the HBPC Program.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains zero or one [0..1] evaluatingLocation, where its type is Service Delivery Location
Service Delivery Location.

Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationAtAdmissionToHbpc, where its type is Hbpc Admission
Evaluation at the time of admission to the HBPC Program.

Contains zero or one [0..1] evaluationAtDischargeFromHbpc, where its type is Hbpc Discharge
Evaluation at the time of discharge from the HBPC Program.
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient

Contains exactly one [1..1] periodOfService, where its type is Military Service Conflict
The Period of time patient served in military.

Contains zero or one [0..1] rejectionWithdrawal, where its type is Rejection Or Withdrawl Event
Rejection/Withdrawal from HBPC Program.
Contains exactly one [1..1] admitRejectStatus with data type Code

Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationDate with data type Point In Time
Represents date the patient was considered/reviwed/evaluated/admitted for the HBPC Program.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
"A unique identifier for the Act." (HL7 3.0)

Contains zero or one [0..1] evaluatingLocation, where its type is Service Delivery Location
Service Delivery Location.

Contains exactly one [1..1] evaluationAtAdmissionToHbpc, where its type is Hbpc Admission
Evaluation at the time of admission to the HBPC Program.

Contains zero or one [0..1] evaluationAtDischargeFromHbpc, where its type is Hbpc Discharge
Evaluation at the time of discharge from the HBPC Program.
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient

Contains exactly one [1..1] periodOfService, where its type is Military Service Conflict
The Period of time patient served in military.

Contains zero or one [0..1] rejectionWithdrawal, where its type is Rejection Or Withdrawl Event
Rejection/Withdrawal from HBPC Program.
